title: Border, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem and darning stitches on plain weave
dimensions: H x W: 7 x 61 cm (2 3/4 x 24 in.)
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: Narrow band, possibly from a curtain, embroidered in a stylized vine and leaf design in two shades of red, two shades of green, and cream. The design is known as the King pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem and darning stitches on plain weave. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-32.
